      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Deconvolutes a set of QTLs given the expression levels, genotypes, and cell counts. Calculates the p-values for the deconvoluted QTLs and writes them to an outfile
        Parameters:
        args - List of command line arguments TODO: Crashes if output folder does not exist, either add clear error message or make output folder
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • calculateSumOfSquaresNNLS

        public static void calculateSumOfSquaresNNLS(LeastSquareModel model,
                                             java.lang.Boolean plotBetaTimesVariables)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Calculate the sum of squares, using Non-Negative Linear Regression, given a y expression vector with y ~ model. This calculates the Beta parameters three times, for samples with GT = 0, GT = 1, GT = 2 instead of using the interaction terms of the actual genotype. If no_intercept == true, remove the intercept (equivalent to y * ~ model -1 in R)
        Parameters:
        model - An InteractionModel object including the y vector expression values and ObservedValues (model) Such that test_trait ~ geno_A + lymph% + geno_A:geno_B it can be for one QTL [[2, 43.4, 86.8], [2, 40.3, 80.6]], for another QTL [[0, 46.7, 0], [0, 51.5, 0] [0, 48.7, 0]]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException

      • multipleLinearRegression

        private static org.apache.commons.math3.stat.regression.OLSMultipleLinearRegression multipleLinearRegression(InteractionModel model,
                                                                                                             java.lang.Boolean plotBetaTimesVariables)
                                                                                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                             java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Calculate the sum of squares, using Ordinary Linear Regression, given a y expression vector with y ~ model. If no_intercept == true, remove the intercept (equivalent to y ~ model -1 in R)
        Parameters:
        model - An InteractionModel object including the y vector expression values and ObservedValues (model) Such that test_trait ~ geno_A + lymph% + geno_A:geno_B it can be for one QTL [[2, 43.4, 86.8], [2, 40.3, 80.6]], for another QTL [[0, 46.7, 0], [0, 51.5, 0] [0, 48.7, 0]]
        Returns:
        The sum of squares value from running linear regression with y ~ model
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
